item.description:
Ok, I know not everyone is a habs fan but a Canadian team this late in the playoffs needs a cheering section.

As such, come out to Elephant and Castle in the financial district to watch the game and cheer on everyones team.

Let bring the cup home.

Alex
item.how_to_find_us: The hostess knows its a canadian meetup. We're in the area to the far left of the entrance.

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: Montreal Canadiens Game
